content: last stitch over and pull through the loop with the new color 2 2 leave the color 1 behind until it is time to work on it again 3 continue to work in color 2 until it is time to change the color back to 1 on the last st in color 2 just pull through the color 1 on the last yarn over and drop the color 2 video how to change yarn color on my youtube https //youtube com/shorts/xoojbyjo5w8 3 labubu crochet pattern fionadolls ears make 2 back pieces with pink fluffy yarn and hook g/6 4 mm ch5 row 1 1 single_crochet into 2nd chain from hook 2 single_crochet increase from 3 single_crochet working on other side of the chain 3 single_crochet = 9 cut the yarn make 2 front pieces with blue fluffy yarn and hook g/6 4 mm ch5 change yarn to peach don t cut blue yarn row 1 with blue yarn 1 single_crochet into 2nd chain from hook 2 single_crochet increase from 3 single_crochet working on other side of the chain 3 single_crochet = 9 cut peach yarn put back and front pieces together with blue fluffy yarn single_crochet around the pieces to join them together 9 single_crochet fasten_off cut the thread repeat for second ear 4 labubu crochet pattern fionadolls head with peach plush yarn and hook g/6 4 mm ch2 round 1 6 single_crochet in to the 2nd chain from the hook= 6 round 2 increase * 6 times = 12 round 3 increase 1 single_crochet * 6 times = 18 round 4 increase 2 single_crochet * 6 times = 24 change yarn from peach to blue round 5 blo increase 3 single_crochet * 6 times = 30 insert eyes between rounds 2 and 3 round 6-7 30 single_crochet round 8 21 single_crochet join 1st ear 3sc through ear and head join 2nd ear 3sc through ear and head 3 single_crochet = 30 round 9-10 30 single_crochet round 11 decrease 3 single_crochet * 6 times = 24 round 12 decrease 2 single_crochet * 6 times = 18 stuff the head round 13 decrease 1 single_crochet * 6 times = 12 round 14 decrease * 6 times = 6 fasten_off cut the thread 5 labubu crochet pattern fionadolls arms with peach plush yarn and hook g/6 4 mm ch2 round 1 6 single_crochet in to the 2nd chain from the hook= 6 round 2 6 single_crochet round 3 increase 2 single_crochet * 2 times = 8 change yarn from peach to blue rounds 4-6 8 single_crochet stuff the piece round 7 decrease 2 single_crochet * 2 times = 6 round 8 fold the arm in half and crochet 3 single_crochet through both sides of the round 7 fasten_off and cut the yarn crochet the second arm legs and body with peach yarn and hook g/6 4 mm ch2 round 1 6 single_crochet into the 2nd chain from the hook= 6 round 2 6 single_crochet change yarn from peach to blue round 3
